title: nf-core/funcscan pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

fasta.errorMessage: Fasta file for reads must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fasta', '.fas', '.fa' or '.fna' (any of these can be optionally compressed as '.gz')

protein.errorMessage: Input file for peptide annotations has incorrect file format. File must end in .fasta, .faa, or .fa

feature.errorMessage: Input file for feature annotations has incorrect file format. File must end in .gbk or .gff
